com.connectforever
Class MyDeviceLocation

java.lang.Object
  java.util.Observable
      com.connectforever.DeviceLocation
          com.connectforever.MyDeviceLocation

public class MyDeviceLocation
extends DeviceLocation

Wrapper class for the android Location updates, keeps track of user's location.

Field Summary
 
Fields inherited from class com.connectforever.DeviceLocation
location

          Creates the listener that keeps track of the location once it is connected to the location manager in the startUpdating() method.

Constructor Detail

MyDeviceLocation

public MyDeviceLocation()
Creates the listener that keeps track of the location once it is connected to the location manager in the startUpdating() method. This listener notifies observers if the location changes.

Method Detail

setLocationManager

public void setLocationManager(LocationManager m)
Sets the Context that is associated with this tracker. This is used for finding the @link{LocationManager}.

stopUpdating

public boolean stopUpdating()
Stops updating the user's location. Should be called from the onPause method in UI class.

Specified by:
stopUpdating in class DeviceLocation
Returns:
If stopping the updates succeeded. It can only succeed when the location manager has been set.

startUpdating

public boolean startUpdating()
Starts updating the user's location. Should be called from the onStart method in UI class.

Specified by:
startUpdating in class DeviceLocation
Returns:
If starting the updates succeeded. It can only succeed when the context has been set.
